author: USA TODAY
title: Watch Florida's spectacular OT buzzer-beater
text:
Watch Florida's spectacular OT buzzer-beater Finally, a buzzer-beater -- in overtime. Post to Facebook Watch Florida's spectacular OT buzzer-beater Finally, a buzzer-beater -- in overtime.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/03/florida-chris-chiozza-buzzer-beater-overtime-3-pointer-one-foot-highlight-march-madness-clutch-video-ncaa-tournament-sweet-16     Watch Florida's spectacular OT buzzer-beater Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 1:10 a.m. ET March 25, 2017 
Mar 24, 2017; New York, NY, USA; Florida Gators guard Chris Chiozza (11) makes a three point basket to beat the Wisconsin Badgers in overtime in the semifinals of the East Regional of the 2017 NCAA Tournament at Madison Square Garden. Mandatory Credit: Robert Deutsch-USA TODAY Sports ORG XMIT: USATSI-357254 ORIG FILE ID: 20170324_pjc_usa_311.JPG (Photo: Robert Deutsch, Robert Deutsch-USA TODAY Sports) 
Around 1 a.m. ET on Friday, March Madness finally gave us the stunning buzzer-beater that we've all been waiting for. 
Florida's Chris Chiozza buried an absolutely insane one-footed three at the buzzer - in overtime - to beat Wisconsin, 84-83. The Gators are heading to the Elite Eight. FLORIDA WINS ON A BUZZER-BEATER! #Sweet16 pic.twitter.com/t8ooUMf7Gy — NCAA March Madness (@marchmadness) March 25, 2017 
However, Wisconsin players shouldn't hang their heads. The Badgers left it all out on the court. 
In regulation, it was Wisconsin's Zak Showalter that was the first hero of the game. He drilled a clutch one-footed 3-pointer for the tie to keep the Badgers' hopes alive. — NCAA March Madness (@marchmadness) March 25, 2017 
To recap: There were TWO stunning one-footed 3-point clutch shots - one for each team - in one game that ended past midnight ET with the first buzzer-beater of the NCAA tournament. Thank you, basketball gods. 
Florida will take on South Carolina on Sunday. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/03/florida-chris-chiozza-buzzer-beater-overtime-3-pointer-one-foot-highlight-march-madness-clutch-video-ncaa-tournament-sweet-16 Most Popular
